system.description:
At 10th level, the scientific breakthrough you chose at 2nd level improves as you continue to unlock new and exciting science.

Augmentation

You gain an additional +1 to one of your ability scores, to a maximum of 22.

Cybernetics

You are no longer limited by your proficiency bonus when determining how many cyberware devices you may use.

Medicine

You develop an immediate cure for all maladies.

Time Travel

Your time travel device allows you to travel back in time and prepare for all eventualities. You may retroactively do one thing you might feasibly have done in the last 24 hours which would have taken no longer than 5 minutes. The Narrator will determine whether or not the action you choose is feasible.
